revised_title: Morphological Studies of Spore-Producing Members: Equisetinae and Lycopodinae
tldr: The author investigates the morphology of spore-producing members, specifically Equisetinae and Lycopodinae, and examines their development and evolution. The study focuses on the sporophyte generation and its relationship to the history of descent in plants, as well as the origin of vascular tissues and the role of sterilization in their formation.
